ARABIC: لَهُمْ فِيهَا فَٰكِهَةٌ وَلَهُم مَّا يَدَّعُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: They will have fruits there and whatever they request.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: For them will be fruits and whatever they ask.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: therein there will be all kinds of fruits to eat, and they shall have all that they desire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: They will have fruits and whatever they desire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: In it (paradise) are fruits for them and whatever they ask for.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: They will have therein fruits and all that they ask for.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: They shall have fruits therein, and they shall have whatever they desire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: therein they have fruits, and they have all that they call for.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Theirs the fruit (of their good deeds) and theirs (all) that they ask;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: They shall have fruits therein, and all that they ask for.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Theirs shall be fruit therein and theirs shall be whatsoever they ask for.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: There they have fruits, and they have whatever they want.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: (Every) fruit (enjoyment) will be there for them; they shall have whatever they call for;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: They will have therein fruits (of all kinds) and all that they ask for.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: They shall have fruits and all that they call for.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: They will have therein fruits. They will have whatever they call for.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: For them therein is fruit, and for them is whatever they request [or wish]
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [36:57] They have fruits therein and, therein, they have whatever they call for, [whatever] they wish for.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: Theirs the fruit) different kinds of fruit (and theirs (all) that they ask) and desire;
